name: The Feathered Serpent
description:
The Feathered Serpent is a 2d action-platformer that combines the fast-paced combat of a shooter game with randomly generated levels, enemies, and items!

The Game is played by using your mouse cursor to aim and shoot at enemies, using special abilities and platforming mechanics to position yourself and take down everything that lies in your path.

A large part of the enjoyment in this game is figuring out what each item does and how it can interact with other items!

You move and jump using WASD, spacebar to jump or the W key. Arrow keys can be used as well.

Shoot - Left Click

Special / Burst - Right Click

Esc - Pause Game

f4 - Toggle Fullscreen

Idol Interaction - When you have the bloodgems required, press "F"  to purchase upgrades. Bloodgems stay with you each "run"

Double Jump - Press the jump key while in the air

Wall Slide - Hold the arrow key in the direction of the wall to slide, when released you will let go of the wall, simply press again to grab back on

Wall Jump - Press the jump key while sliding down a Wall to jump off!

Treasure! - Shoot treasure chests to break them open!

ENJOY - please feel free to post comments with suggestions, feedback, and bugs! I hope you enjoy the demo!
